original: Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṁ
dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
